content: तोरणः --णं [तुर्-युच् आधारे ल्युट् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} An arched doorway, a portal. {@--2@} An outer door or gateway; गणो नृपाणामथ तोरणाद् बहिः <ls>Śi. 12. 1</ls>; दूराल्लक्ष्यं सुरपतिधनुश्चारुणा तोरणेन <ls>Me. 75.</ls> {@--3@} Any temporary and ornamental arch; <ls>Ku. 7. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 41</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 4</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 5.</ls> {@--4@} An elevated place near a bathing-place. --णं The neck, throat. --णः <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.

तोरणः --णं [तुर्-युच् आधारे ल्युट् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} An arched doorway, a portal. {@--2@} An outer door or gateway; गणो नृपाणामथ तोरणाद् बहिः <ls>Śi. 12. 1</ls>; दूराल्लक्ष्यं सुरपतिधनुश्चारुणा तोरणेन <ls>Me. 75.</ls> {@--3@} Any temporary and ornamental arch; <ls>Ku. 7. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 41</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 4</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 5.</ls> {@--4@} An elevated place near a bathing-place. --णं The neck, throat. --णः <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva.
